title: Passed Meeqat without making Ihram - Assim al hakeem
transcript: she says that his sister came from Riyadh she had an exam on Friday and they wanted to go for Umbra on Saturday so she passed them apart with his wife and did not make the intention of Akram though she had the firm intention to make it on Saturday so now after finishing the exam what to do the answer is she has to go back to Taif and assume Haram from the method of Pi which is a sale el kebir or Y de marr√≥n either one and she goes and make her homra if she makes it from JIT that she has to slaughter a sheep for every person who makes a hump because they all pass them a cut with the intention of Rome bruh and they did not assume their haram from the mean part so I hope this answers your question
